name: Roll Playing Game (OwlTreeStudios)
description:
Due to a mistake on my part, the game wasn't uploaded correctly and cannot be played. I'll update the game with the actually playable file after the voting period is over, so if you want to play the game, you can. I appreciate you checking it out anyway! :)))

You are a 4 sided die. Adventure through a world full of living dice, fighting creatures to protect other dice. The catch is, your damage is entirely dependent on the roll of the dice (luckily these ones aren't alive).

Unfortunately, I was only able to complete a battle system, so this is a bit more of a proof of concept than a game. Still, I hope you enjoy the feel of the game and visuals!
